        public void centerOrigin()

      • getHeader

        public TinyVGHeader getHeader()
        Each TVG file starts with a header defining some global values for the file like scale and image size.

      • getColorTable

        public com.badlogic.gdx.graphics.Color[] getColorTable()
        The color table encodes the palette for this file. It’s binary content is defined by the color_encoding field in the header. For the three defined color encodings, each will yield a list of color_count RGBA tuples.

      • getCommands

        public com.badlogic.gdx.utils.Array<Command> getCommands()
        TinyVG files contain a sequence of draw commands that must be executed in the defined order to get the final result. Each draw command adds a new 2D primitive to the graphic.

      • isClipBasedOnTVGSize

        public boolean isClipBasedOnTVGSize()
        Clips the TVG based on the provided image size. Requires depth buffer.

        public void setClipBasedOnTVGSize(boolean clipBasedOnTVGSize)
        Clips the TVG based on the provided image size. Requires depth buffer.

      • isDirtyCurves

        public boolean isDirtyCurves()
        Next time render gets called and the tvg is dirty, it recalculates all point positions in paths. (Slow)

      • isDirtyTransformationMatrix

        public boolean isDirtyTransformationMatrix()
        Next time render gets called and the tvg is dirty, it recalculates the transformation matrix. (Fast)
